alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:06PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock, northern Holt, eastern Keya Paha and Boyd Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lynch to near Atkinson. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Lynch, Naper, Gross, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka, Monowi, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Mariaville, Mills, Brocksburg, Spencer Dam, Midway and Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 272 and 299. Highway 281 between mile markers 193 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 73 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
